  • July Update

    Jul 8, 2014:

    Life is positive, I am starting to realize what path I truly want to follow, life-wise and acting-wise. I have been spending the beginning of my summer writing, reading and brainstorming and it has been bringing me serenity and focus. I feel I am transitioning into a new era of my blooming existence and I am sensing it is for the better. [Read more...]
